basic.description: This course provides a critical philosophical examination of representations of girls and women in fantasy and science fiction. Throughout the semester, students make use of traditional philosophical texts as well as non-traditional materials, such as film, literature, television, and comics to examine questions of womens' nature, girlhood, beauty, violence, oppression, and sexual agency.
basic.subject: IFS
basic.title: Fantasy Girls: Philosophical Examinations of Women and Girls in Fantasy and Science Fiction
